'''''Divine Roots''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach the Max Level of [[Sacred Sakura's Favor]].

==Trivia==
* Despite being added in [[Version 2.0]], this achievement could not be earned until [[Version 2.4]] at the earliest, as the Max Level of Sacred Sakura's Favor was not unlocked until then.
** Due to this, the [[Inazuma: Kujou Insignia]] namecard was also unavailable until this version.
